author: jstrachan
msg: Added Calvin and Stephen to list of contributors

author: jstrachan
msg: Applied Calvin Yu's patches that <fileScanner> can be used to iterate through just directories rather than files.

author: jstrachan
msg: Patched to make the XPath expressions more explcit and non-relative. This helps get around a temporary bugette with JSL somehow breaking the current XPath context.

author: jstrachan
msg: Also removed the local copy of Ant's IntrospectionHelper that was added as a temporary hack.
Added a patch for Ant tags which can be both a Task and a nested object.
For example the <manifest> tag can be a ManifestTask if used by itself, of if it is embedded inside a <jar> Task then the Jar.addConfiguredManifest() is called instead.
This fixes the manifest bug that was introduced by the move of Maven to Ant 1.5.
